data.text: ――That weekend.
data.processed: <story>――That weekend.

data.text:
Thank you for coming with me today! 
So now, let's, uh, let's go where you want to go first!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>Thank you for coming with me today! 
<story>So now, let's, uh, let's go where you want to go first!

data.text:
Affrimative. 
Target destination:『there』.
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
<story>Affrimative. 
<story>Target destination:『there』.

data.text: 『Training Care』. This is "JYVE".
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed: <story>『Training Care』. This is "JYVE".

data.text:
(Uni-san is so focused on that book... 
Is she interested in getting it?)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(Uni-san is so focused on that book... 
<story>Is she interested in getting it?)

data.text:
(All right. I just need to buy it for her, and... 
Wait, what? Where did she――)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(All right. I just need to buy it for her, and... 
<story>Wait, what? Where did she――)

data.text:
『Sorry for the delay』, Zenno Rob Roy. 
Here. "GIVU".
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
<story>『Sorry for the delay』, Zenno Rob Roy. 
<story>Here. "GIVU".

data.text:
F-for me...!? 
Th-thank you very much...
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>F-for me...!? 
<story>Th-thank you very much...

data.text:
――! 
Zenno Rob Roy, "stand by" here.
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
<story>――! 
<story>Zenno Rob Roy, "stand by" here.

data.text:
(Does she need to use the restroom? ――Oh! I can take this 
chance to find a café she would like...)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(Does she need to use the restroom? ――Oh! I can take this 
<story>chance to find a café she would like...)

data.text: ――"Reentry" complete.
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed: <story>――"Reentry" complete.

data.text: Uni-san! Would you like to go to a café――
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>Uni-san! Would you like to go to a café――

data.text: Is this "resupply"... 『unnecessary』?
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed: <story>Is this "resupply"... 『unnecessary』?

data.text: Not at all! Thank you..!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>Not at all! Thank you..!

data.text:
(Ugh... Not only am I not returning the favor, she's doing even 
more for me...!)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(Ugh... Not only am I not returning the favor, she's doing even 
<story>more for me...!)

data.text: (But, I have to do at least one thing in return...! There has to be something or someplace she would like... ――I've got it!)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: (But, I have to do at least one thing in return...! There has to be something or someplace she would like... ――I've got it!)

data.text:
――Uni-san! 
Would you like to watch a movie!?
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>――Uni-san! 
<story>Would you like to watch a movie!?

data.text: The "panorama" of the space flight... was 『fascinating』.
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed: <story>The "panorama" of the space flight... was 『fascinating』.

data.text:
It's a film I've wanted to recommend you for a long time now! 
So, um... did you enjoy it?
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>It's a film I've wanted to recommend you for a long time now! 
<story>So, um... did you enjoy it?

data.text:
Affirmative. 
Zenno Rob Roy's "recommendations" are 『favorites』.
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
<story>Affirmative. 
<story>Zenno Rob Roy's "recommendations" are 『favorites』.

data.text:
(Thank goodness... 
It may not have been by much, but I managed to return a bit of 
her kindness...)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(Thank goodness... 
<story>It may not have been by much, but I managed to return a bit of 
<story>her kindness...)

data.text:
Thank you for coming along with me today. I had a wonderful 
time. I hope, um... I hope it was enjoyable for you too, Uni-san.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>Thank you for coming along with me today. I had a wonderful 
<story>time. I hope, um... I hope it was enjoyable for you too, Uni-san.

data.text:
"ENJI". 
『Fun』was had. 
Will Zenno Rob Roy 『train』again tomorrow?
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
<story>"ENJI". 
<story>『Fun』was had. 
<story>Will Zenno Rob Roy 『train』again tomorrow?

data.text:
Y-yes! Kris S-san and Taiki-san have been helping me train 
recently. We'll be right back to it tomorrow――
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>Y-yes! Kris S-san and Taiki-san have been helping me train 
<story>recently. We'll be right back to it tomorrow――

data.text: Neo Universe will provide『help』.
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed: <story>Neo Universe will provide『help』.

data.text: What? No, please, you don't need to! I'd feel guilty if you did! You're already doing so, so much for my sake...!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: What? No, please, you don't need to! I'd feel guilty if you did! You're already doing so, so much for my sake...!

data.text:
To tell you the truth, I invited you out so I could return all the 
favors you've done for me... 
...I hoped I could, at least.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>To tell you the truth, I invited you out so I could return all the 
<story>favors you've done for me... 
<story>...I hoped I could, at least.

data.text:
But ultimately I couldn't do much... 
That's why I can't take advantage of your kindness any longer!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>But ultimately I couldn't do much... 
<story>That's why I can't take advantage of your kindness any longer!

data.text:
So, please, you don't need to worry about me. 
Anyway, well, um... Thank you. I'll see you at school.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>So, please, you don't need to worry about me. 
<story>Anyway, well, um... Thank you. I'll see you at school.

data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed: <story>――――

data.text:
That was... "rejection"? 
"Failure to launch"... "Termination"...?
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
<story>That was... "rejection"? 
<story>"Failure to launch"... "Termination"...?

data.text:
Root cause analysis... "Aid" provided "matched" correctly with 
"needs". Zenno Rob Roy's response was 『Thank you』.
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
<story>Root cause analysis... "Aid" provided "matched" correctly with 
<story>"needs". Zenno Rob Roy's response was 『Thank you』.

data.text:
Then... What caused the negative result? 
Cause of "ABSS"..."Analysis" impossible.
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
<story>Then... What caused the negative result? 
<story>Cause of "ABSS"..."Analysis" impossible.

data.text: Is it because『Neo Universe is an alien』...?
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed: <story>Is it because『Neo Universe is an alien』...?

data.text: Tcennoc.
data.name: Little Universe
data.processed: Tcennoc.

data.text: Shee...nock? Uhh.... "Knock", like in baseball? Wait, no, I need to account for what "shee" means... Hmm...
data.name: Universe's Father
data.processed: Shee...nock? Uhh.... "Knock", like in baseball? Wait, no, I need to account for what "shee" means... Hmm...

data.text: Tcennoc.
data.name: Elementary School Universe
data.processed: Tcennoc.

data.text: Uhh... Whaaat? What's that mean? Guuyys, let's go play hide and seeeek!
data.name: Elementary School Classmate
data.processed: Uhh... Whaaat? What's that mean? Guuyys, let's go play hide and seeeek!

data.text: Tcennoc.
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed: Tcennoc.

data.text: Uhhh... You sure are doing well today, huh? ...Sorry, I don't quite understand what you mean by "Sheenock", but... Good luck with your training.
data.name: Homeroom Teacher
data.processed: Uhhh... You sure are doing well today, huh? ...Sorry, I don't quite understand what you mean by "Sheenock", but... Good luck with your training.

data.text:
"CUTT"... "Connection" impossible. "Communication" impossible. 
――Because『Neo Universe is an alien』.
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
<story>"CUTT"... "Connection" impossible. "Communication" impossible. 
<story>――Because『Neo Universe is an alien』.

data.text:
Potentially "FTL". 
"Communication" with the universe... The book of the cosmos... 
These provided "comfort".
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
<story>Potentially "FTL". 
<story>"Communication" with the universe... The book of the cosmos... 
<story>These provided "comfort".

data.text: To everyone else, it was "the dark side of the moon"―― A world, a [*universe*] for Neo Universe alone. Neo Universe's 『home』――
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed: To everyone else, it was "the dark side of the moon"―― A world, a [*universe*] for Neo Universe alone. Neo Universe's 『home』――

data.text:
E-excuse me...! 
You're Neo Universe-senpai, aren't you...?
data.processed:
<story>E-excuse me...! 
<story>You're Neo Universe-senpai, aren't you...?

data.text:
Ah... S-sorry to bother you...! 
So, this book... It's about space, right?
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>Ah... S-sorry to bother you...! 
<story>So, this book... It's about space, right?

data.text:
I noticed you often check out books on the topic, and, well... 
I've had space on my mind ever since. This book caught my eye, 
so I couldn't help but call out――
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>I noticed you often check out books on the topic, and, well... 
<story>I've had space on my mind ever since. This book caught my eye, 
<story>so I couldn't help but call out――

data.text:
―― 『Earth-Alpha』. Like "Gliese", a "TERY" of a planet. 
"Existence" is unproven, yet "Apollo"――
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
<story>―― 『Earth-Alpha』. Like "Gliese", a "TERY" of a planet. 
<story>"Existence" is unproven, yet "Apollo"――

data.text: ...Negative. "Communication" is impossible.
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed: <story>...Negative. "Communication" is impossible.

data.text:
Glie... Apollo... Umm, are these space terms? 
――Oh, Earth-Alpha... I think I know what that means!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>Glie... Apollo... Umm, are these space terms? 
<story>――Oh, Earth-Alpha... I think I know what that means!

data.text:
――! 
"TIPS"... Signal slightly "received"?
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
<story>――! 
<story>"TIPS"... Signal slightly "received"?

data.text:
I've heard about Earth-Alpha! It's the theory that, outside our 
galaxy, there's a solar system similar to our sun's, like a parallel 
universe...!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>I've heard about Earth-Alpha! It's the theory that, outside our 
<story>galaxy, there's a solar system similar to our sun's, like a parallel 
<story>universe...!

data.text:
The idea of another Earth was widely derided as delusional, 
but there are so many stories out there dreaming of such a 
fantastical world!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>The idea of another Earth was widely derided as delusional, 
<story>but there are so many stories out there dreaming of such a 
<story>fantastical world!

data.text:
So you mean this book has to do with Earth-Alpha!? 
――Oh... S-sorry, I got caught up in my excitement!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>So you mean this book has to do with Earth-Alpha!? 
<story>――Oh... S-sorry, I got caught up in my excitement!

data.text:
........E-err... Only if you're willing to, of course, but... 
――Would you recommend some books for me to read?
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>........E-err... Only if you're willing to, of course, but... 
<story>――Would you recommend some books for me to read?

data.text:
You're incredible, Uni-san! You're so much more knowledgeable 
than I am. And every book you recommend is incredible, too.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>You're incredible, Uni-san! You're so much more knowledgeable 
<story>than I am. And every book you recommend is incredible, too.

data.text:
The world must shine so beautifully, seen through your eyes... 
...You have a truly special point of view.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>The world must shine so beautifully, seen through your eyes... 
<story>...You have a truly special point of view.

data.text: ――I'd like to see the very same sights as you, someday.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>――I'd like to see the very same sights as you, someday.

data.text:
Zenno Rob Roy brought 『happiness』into the "Alphard" 
[*world*].
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
<story>Zenno Rob Roy brought 『happiness』into the "Alphard" 
<story>[*world*].

data.text:
Wishing to "observe" the "same" sky. 
Bringing『happiness』. 
That's why we are "ZEER"...
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
<story>Wishing to "observe" the "same" sky. 
<story>Bringing『happiness』. 
<story>That's why we are "ZEER"...

data.text:
"Interaction" through language is impossible. 
However, "hypothesis"――『standing by her』is realizable.
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
<story>"Interaction" through language is impossible. 
<story>However, "hypothesis"――『standing by her』is realizable.

data.text:
...Hypothesis rejected. 
Unable to "GIVU" smoothly. 
Realization, infeasible...?
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
<story>...Hypothesis rejected. 
<story>Unable to "GIVU" smoothly. 
<story>Realization, infeasible...?

data.text: ――Universe?
data.name: Fuji Kiseki
data.processed: <story>――Universe?

data.text: .....You've got a sad look on your face. What's got you down?
data.name: Fuji Kiseki
data.processed: <story>.....You've got a sad look on your face. What's got you down?
